scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n "remote1,remote2,remote3,host" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:remote1" "npm run dev:remote2" "npm run dev:remote3" "npm run dev:host"
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 npm run build --prefix host
scripts.build:all: npm run build:lib && npm run build:remote1 && npm run build:remote2 && npm run build:remote3 && npm run build:host
scripts.build:host: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 npm run build --prefix host
scripts.build:remote1: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 npm run build --prefix remote1
scripts.build:remote2: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 npm run build --prefix remote2
scripts.build:remote3: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 npm run build --prefix remote3
